name: Articuno
author: Yusuke Ohmura
flavor_text: A legendary bird Pokémon. It can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.

abilities.name: Blizzard Veil
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, whenever your opponent plays a Supporter card from their hand, prevent all effects of that card done to your Benched {W} Pokémon.

attacks.name: Cold Cyclone
attacks.effect: Move 2 {W} Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
